item.title: My Thoughts on Social Media
item.description: Lately, I’ve had some friends ask me why I don’t use social media outside of Reddit and Snapchat. Here are some general and loosely-connected thoughts on social media and what I don’t like about it. The main reason I don’t care for social media is that it encourages group-think. There are plenty of examples of this; though Twitter is especially bad about it. Part of it is a human issue - many people are far too eager to attack someone who seemingly disagrees with them instead of having a discussion about it - but the other part of it lies within the social media network’s architecture.
